Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about PDF Magic

Yes, absolutely! PDF Magic processes all your files locally in your web browser. This means your files never leave your device and are never uploaded to any external servers. Your privacy and security are 100% guaranteed.

Yes! We believe essential PDF tools should be accessible to everyone. All standard features on PDF Magic are completely free without any hidden charges or watermarks.

Because processing happens in your browser, the limit depends on your device's memory (RAM). However, for most modern devices, PDFs up to 50MB should process smoothly and quickly.

Yes, PDF Magic is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. You can convert, compress, and organize your PDFs right from your smartphone or tablet browser.
